ModMetaData.name: More Records - Interaction
ModMetaData.author: 民火
ModMetaData.description:
Add records about interaction. 交流に関する記録を追加します。
# Additional Records - Social fight (Time) - Lovin (Time) - Interact (Count)*1 - Interacted (Count)*1
*1 e.g.: chitchat, insult, romance attempt It also supports InteractionDef added by other mods.
